Name: IceLine
About the game: The game 'Iceline' is the story of the Ice Magician, who collects magic crystals and takes his skills to the next level. This is a puzzle game with unique mechanics in which the player character leaves an ice trail behind him and thus changes the playing field for himself! The mage encounters obstacles in the form of walls, rocks, or ice trails on his path. When the mage crosses an ice trail, his mana gains the ability to overcome any obstacle! In later levels, different colors of ice appear and this leads to some truly incredible logical challenges! Each game level is a puzzle with its own logical solution. Features: - A unique puzzle mechanic where the player modifies the playing field. - 50 levels of increasing difficulty. - Intuitive game rules, which, however, will make you think in the final levels! - Neat, clear puzzle graphics -- nothing unnecessary! - Play at your own pace. - Thrilling, but not annoying music will accompany you throughout the game!
